profiles module¶

class profiles.SCORE_PROFILE(matFile)[source]¶

Bases: object

profiles.create_profile(name, damage_types, damage_scores, damage_areas, loc='score_profiles')[source]¶
Parameters

  • name -- name of the coring techniques eg Ratingen, VdH-PsA, PsA-MSS, Steinbrocker

  • damage_types -- tuple like of string for the feature being described e.g. ['erosion','JSN']

  • damage_scores -- tuple of interval for discrete range of score values e.g. [(0,5),(0,3)] represents 0,1,2,3,4,5 and 0,1,2,3

Returns

profiles.load_profile(profile_loc)[source]¶
